name: Supers tetris
description:
Description:
1, It's the most famous puzzle game ever.
2, four game modes - easy & medium & Hard & Time run.
3, Save & Load mode
4, Please enjoy the classic blocks, and get more points!
How to play:
- Create horizontal lines using the falling blocks..
- When you make a line, it is cleared from the screen.
- The game is over when the blocks pile up and reach the top of the screen.
- You get more points for completing multiple lines at once.
